java/liquibase/change/CreateIndexChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.CreateIndexStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Index;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00009 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00012 
00013 import java.util.*;
00014 
00018 public class CreateIndexChange extends AbstractChange {
00019 
00020     private String schemaName;
00021     private String tableName;
00022     private String indexName;
00023     private String tablespace;
00024     private List<ColumnConfig> columns;
00025 
00026 
00027     public CreateIndexChange() {
00028         super("createIndex", "Create Index");
00029         columns = new ArrayList<ColumnConfig>();
00030     }
00031 
00032     public String getIndexName() {
00033         return indexName;
00034     }
00035 
00036     public void setIndexName(String indexName) {
00037         this.indexName = indexName;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public String getSchemaName() {
00041         return schemaName;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00045         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00046     }
00047 
00048     public String getTableName() {
00049         return tableName;
00050     }
00051 
00052     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00053         this.tableName = tableName;
00054     }
00055 
00056     public List<ColumnConfig> getColumns() {
00057         return columns;
00058     }
00059 
00060     public void setColumns(List<ColumnConfig> columns) {
00061         this.columns = columns;
00062     }
00063 
00064     public void addColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00065         columns.add(column);
00066     }
00067 
00068 
00069     public String getTablespace() {
00070         return tablespace;
00071     }
00072 
00073     public void setTablespace(String tablespace) {
00074         this.tablespace = tablespace;
00075     }
00076 
00077     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00078         List<String> columns = new ArrayList<String>();
00079         for (ColumnConfig column : getColumns()) {
00080             columns.add(column.getName());
00081         }
00082 
00083         return new SqlStatement []{
00084                 new CreateIndexStatement(getIndexName(), getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getTableName(), columns.toArray(new String[getColumns().size()])).setTablespace(getTablespace())
00085         };
00086     }
00087 
00088     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00089         DropIndexChange inverse = new DropIndexChange();
00090         inverse.setSchemaName(getSchemaName());
00091         inverse.setTableName(getTableName());
00092         inverse.setIndexName(getIndexName());
00093 
00094         return new Change[]{
00095                 inverse
00096         };
00097     }
00098 
00099     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00100         return "Index " + getIndexName() + " created";
00101     }
00102 
00103     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00104         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("createIndex");
00105         element.setAttribute("indexName", getIndexName());
00106         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00107             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00108         }
00109 
00110         element.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00111 
00112         for (ColumnConfig column : getColumns()) {
00113             Element columnElement = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("column");
00114             columnElement.setAttribute("name", column.getName());
00115             element.appendChild(columnElement);
00116         }
00117 
00118         return element;
00119     }
00120 
00121     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00122         Index index = new Index();
00123         index.setTable(new Table(tableName));
00124         index.setName(indexName);
00125 
00126         Table table= new Table(getTableName());
00127 
00128         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(index, table));
00129     }
00130 
00131 }
